TopicTitle: Astronaut Complex will not upgrade after upgrading to 1.4.3

Articles.Content:
I had a game running in 1.4.2 and had every building upgraded. Then I upgraded it to 1.4.3. Everything was running great until I went to hire more Kerbals and found that I couldn't. It said I had a limit of 12 yet I already had 22 since it was an upgrade from a running game. 

I tried to upgrade the astronaut complex and got the message that I couldn't because 'Midlands' was blocking it. Midlands is not any of my parts but it is the biome.

I don't know how the biome could block it but does anyone know how it might be fixed?

I need help as I have run out of engineers
